hero.title: Smart Scheduling for Your Business
hero.subtitle: Streamline your operations, reduce no-shows, and grow your business with our powerful scheduling platform.

features.title: Powerful Scheduling Features for Business
features.subtitle: All in One Platform
features.description: Streamline your scheduling workflow with powerful tools that drive business growth

calendar.title: Interactive Calendar
calendar.description: Easily manage your schedule with our intuitive calendar. Set availability, handle bookings, and view your entire schedule at a glance.

clients.title: Client Management
clients.description: Keep track of client information, preferences, and booking history in one organized system. Build stronger relationships with detailed insights.

reminders.title: Smart Notifications
reminders.description: Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Keep clients and staff informed with timely notifications about appointments and changes.

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Make data-driven decisions with insights into booking patterns, client preferences, and business performance metrics.

mobile.title: Mobile-Friendly
mobile.description: Manage your business on the go. Access your schedule, handle bookings, and stay connected from any device.

settings.title: Customizable Settings
settings.description: Tailor the platform to your business needs. Set custom booking rules, service durations, and availability windows.

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Business
solutions.subtitle: Discover how EasyTakt can help your specific industry

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent
pricing.subtitle: Pricing for Everyone
pricing.description: No hidden fees. No long-term contracts. Just everything you need to run your business efficiently.

items.title: Reduce No-Shows
items.description: Smart reminders and confirmations dramatically reduce missed appointments

items.title: Save Admin Time
items.description: Automate your scheduling workflow and free up hours every week

items.title: Boost Client Satisfaction
items.description: Deliver a seamless booking experience that keeps clients coming back

items.title: Increase Revenue
items.description: Fill empty slots and optimize your schedule for maximum earnings

items.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
items.answer: No, EasyTakt is a month-to-month service. You can cancel at any time without any penalties.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: None at all. The monthly fee covers everything, including setup and onboarding support.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards and can provide invoices for bank transfers within the EU.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: We offer a single comprehensive plan that includes all features. No need to worry about upgrading or downgrading.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
finalCta.description: Join thousands of businesses already saving time and growing with EasyTakt.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join hundreds of businesses already saving time and growing with EasyTakt.
